data.actual_result: Voice settings open, lowering the bitrate and leaving your music really low. (If not using headphones, the audio will switch from main speaker to the one you use in a call with someone)
data.expected_result: Voice settings should open without affecting current audio in background
data.short_description: (Headphones) Audio bitrate and volume lowered when entering voice settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Open preferred music app (Spotify) - Start some music - Open Discord, open settings (gear icon), and open Voice, under App Settings
